body:
Comment 10 by **james.harr**: 
Is the addition of CBC ciphers completely out of the question? I don't think anyone is
asking for these ciphers to be enabled by default. While it does pose a security risk,
sometimes people have to deal with SSH implementations that don't support CTR ciphers.
In this case, bad cryptography is better than plain text as long as the library user
knows what's happening.
